thread.title: upcoming Trump events | Obama Birthplace Controversy
thread.title_full: upcoming Trump events | Obama Birthplace Controversy

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: upcoming Trump events | Obama Birthplace Controversy
text:
(Before It's News)
Dear Orly Taitz,
Every day we are gaining momentum. We have been on top in the polls for over 100 days straight .
We are polling at our highest numbers ever . Morning Consult puts us with 51% nationwide counting votes for second choice. It’s incredible. CNN puts us at 27%. In New Hampshire we are at 28% – over a dozen points ahead of 2nd place. We are beating everyone – even in their home states.
We are gaining momentum and gaining support. 8,000 people came to Anderson, SC to hear our message. It broke the all time venue record. The crowd was incredible – veterans, students, parents, and great Americans from every kind of background joined us.
Attendees in Anderson, SC
Tomorrow evening I’ll be at the Burlington Memorial Auditorium in Iowa. Get your tickets here .
This weekend I’ll be making 2 stops in Florida. On Friday we’ll be at the Trump National Doral in Miami at 7pm. Tickets can be reserved here .
On Saturday at noon we’ll be at the Jacksonville Landing. It’s going to be a huge event – don’t miss it. Get your ticket here .
As we continue to bring our message across America we hope you’ll join us on one of our campaign stops. Next week we’ll be heading to Colorado for a two hour Republican Debate.
We look forward to seeing you on the campaign trail as together we Make America Great Again!
Donald J. Trump
